meanings.sent1: The dropsied man had a puffy face.
meanings.sent2: Her dropsied ankles made it hard for her to walk.
meanings.sent3: The dropsied pumpkin looked like it had too much water.
meanings.sent4: The dropsied clouds loomed heavy in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The dropsied balloon burst with a loud pop.

meanings.definition: Swollen with an excessive accumulation of fluid.
meanings.sent1: The dropsied river overflowed its banks.
meanings.sent2: The dropsied tomato was too ripe to eat.
meanings.sent3: The dropsied sponge soaked up all the water in the sink.
meanings.sent4: Her dropsied eyes were red and tired from crying.
meanings.sent5: The dropsied balloon sagged under the weight of the water inside.
